title: Stocks are setting up for a big rally
itunes:title: Stocks are setting up for a big rally
description: Today’s episode starts with a look at previous bear markets… how long it took for investors’ fears to be fully priced into stocks… and why earnings growth will fuel the next big rally. I also break down the factors behind surging energy and food prices… and one sector that will ride the uptrend. Next, I update my inflation predictions… and explain why—despite the current risks—there’s a lot of upside for stocks right now. That’s why I added three new positions to the  portfolio last week. Finally, I recap the  we announced last week… and how accredited investors can join us on the deal. In this episode:  Why fear will drive huge returns for investors [0:20] What to expect from energy and food prices [5:12] One sector to buy right now [11:07] Why inflation is about to start falling [14:10] It’s a high-risk/high-reward environment [16:29]  How accredited investors can get in on our  [23:15] Enjoyed this episode?
